ctx: intros m z i H1 H2 p.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart i : nat H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : exd m z p := Iter_upb m z : nat The term "i" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "Z".

ctx: intros m z i H1 H2 p.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros m z i H1 H2 p. exists (i mod p). split. - rewrite <- (Nat.add_0_r i) at 1. rewrite <- Nat.mul_1_l at 1. rewrite Nat.mod_add; auto. rewrite Nat.mod_small; auto. apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r. - apply Nat.mod_upper_bound; auto.
